description:
Layer under your ski shell or pull on over a baselayer and sport it on and off the mountain. The breathable fleece provides soft, streamlined warmth and comfort for those who like to keep it simple.

  • Warm, compressible polyester fleece has a brushed inner face
  • Two zippered hand pockets, snap chest pockets and internal dump pocket
  • Mock collar for extra coverage
  • Raglan sleeve construction for freedom of movement
  • Standard fit offers no surprises, just comfort
name: Mountain Hardwear Explore Fleece Jacket - Men's
